title: Form Applications
description: Used when any application process is started, such as financing, limit changes, or educational programs.

approved.title: Form Application Approved
approved.description: Captured when a visitor application has been approved.

declined.title: Form Application Declined
declined.description: Captured when a visitor application has been declined.

ID.title: ID
ID.description: Identifier used during an application process.

requestedAmount.title: Requested Amount
requestedAmount.description: Tracks the monetary value of the application.

status.title: Status
status.description: Captures the status of the application for any given point in the application process.

statusUpdate.title: Status Update
statusUpdate.description: Captured when the status for an application changes, either from an online or offline update.

underReview.title: Under Review
underReview.description: Captured when a visitor application has been placed under review.
